scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/features/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/features/
scripts.deploy:uitest: npm run build:ui && git checkout full_stack_open_deployment_uitest && git add . && git add ../../part2/features/src/ && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin full_stack_open_deployment_uitest -f && git reset HEAD^ && git stash && git checkout full_stack_open && git stash apply && rm -rf build/ && git checkout -- `git ls-files build`
